remarks: Relationship between an equivalence and an equivalence with some negation, for decidable propositions.  Based on theorem *5.18 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 124.  Given decidability, we can consider ` -. ( ph <-> -. ps ) ` to represent "negated exclusive-or".  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 4-Apr-2018.)
statement: pm5.18dc $p |- ( DECID ph -> ( DECID ps -> ( ( ph <-> ps ) <-> -. ( ph <-> -. ps ) ) ) ) $.
